name: Copper Health
headline: Modern patient engagement and remote therapeutic monitoring platform
description: All-in-one RTM platform designed for physical therapy and powered by AI
tags: industry:health-tech; industry:telehealth; industry:b2b; industry:digital-health; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Joanne Wang, Founder
founders.description: Joanne is the co-founder and CEO of Copper Health. Before Copper Health, she was an investor at General Atlantic where she worked on venture and growth investments in the B2B software space. Joanne studied Computing & Data Science and Finance at NYU.

founders.name: Tommy Guo, Founder
founders.description: Tommy is the co-founder & CTO of Copper Health. He was Stripe's first new grad hire in NYC. As a senior software engineer at Stripe, he worked on search infrastructure and led a team to redesign Stripe's API to accept multiple currencies. Tommy studied Computer Science at NYU.

# Modern RTM platform
# for physical therapists
## Earn Remote Therapeutic Monitoring
## reimbursements through our
## AI-powered HEP platform
## Earn RTM reimbursements
## through our AI-powered
## HEP platform
Free RTM Consultation
# Continuous care beyond in-person sessions
# Copper Health’s AI platform drives better patient compliance with HEPs and helps physical therapists get reimbursed for remote therapeutic monitoring (RTM) without extra work.
## Generate more revenue from RTM
Copper’s HEP platform makes it easier for physical therapists to stay connected with their patients and monitor their progress. Patients feel more engaged, while therapists benefit from RTM reimbursements—up to $165 per patient per month.
![Physical therapist with patient, using Copper HEP](https://www.copperhealth.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdns6yuyrjmal5.cloudfront.net%2Fphysical_therapist_with_patient_original.webp&w=3840&q=75)
## Hassle-free and stress-free for physical therapists
Overwhelmed by RTM training and documentation? Our platform simplifies the entire RTM process, from tracking patient data to automatically creating RTM documentation. We also integrate with various EMR platforms.
![Smiling physical therapist, using Copper HEP](https://www.copperhealth.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdns6yuyrjmal5.cloudfront.net%2Fsmiling_pt_original.webp&w=3840&q=75)
## Improve patient outcomes and satisfaction
Copper Health uses AI-powered patient engagement to enable better compliance with home exercise programs. Using our platform, clinicians can track patient progress between visits and provide guidance when needed via HIPAA-compliant messaging. Patients develop stronger bonds with their clinicians, while clinicians achieve better patient outcomes.
![Woman talking on phone, using Copper HEP](https://www.copperhealth.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdns6yuyrjmal5.cloudfront.net%2Fwoman_on_phone_original.webp&w=3840&q=75)
HOW IT WORKS
# Partner with Copper Health to augment your practice with RTM and get paid for it.
[**Copper Health**](https://www.copperhealth.co/</about>) gives you everything you need to deliver a 10x patient experience while increasing your practice’s revenue with RTM billings. Unlike other tools that create extra work for PTs, our AI-powered platform automates the entire RTM process for you. During our onboarding, we guide you through every aspect of the RTM codes and requirements. Once it’s set up, Copper’s platform runs in the background, eliminating manual work for clinicians. You focus on physical therapy; we handle the rest. Get set up quickly - completely free to start.
### 01
Easy to set up: Our platform is low-stress for PTs, saving you time with zero manual setup or data entry. We integrate with various EMRs and handle RTM eligibility checks upfront, so you can enroll patients within seconds.
### 02
Text-based experience: Copper provides text-based patient engagement, so patients do not need to download any mobile app. We manage ongoing patient engagement and automatically track patient data to ensure you meet the RTM criteria.
### 03
Maximize your RTM reimbursements: We help you maximize the value of RTM reimbursements, instead of just capturing a subset of RTM codes.
![Women using laptop](https://www.copperhealth.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdns6yuyrjmal5.cloudfront.net%2Fwoman_in_pink_using_laptop_cropped.webp&w=3840&q=75)
Feel the difference
# Copper Health
# Other RTM Providers
# Designed to eliminate admin work for PTs
# Continuous patient engagement to help you satisfy RTM billing requirements
# AI-powered automation to manage the entire RTM process for you
# Flexible pricing structure with no upfront costs
# Easy to set up and seamlessly integrates with various EMR systems
What clinicians and patients are saying
Helena K. 
Clinician
”
My patients all find Copper Health easy to use and to maintain communication outside of the clinic. I have heard from many patients that it is the easiest platform to use and they find the videos helpful with performing home exercises. I myself appreciate how customizable the program is for each patient and their unique needs.
CJ L. 
Clinic Director
”
Copper Health has significantly increased my patient's engagement and compliance with HEPs. The platform is easy to use and efficient in creating exercise programs. My patients have loved the interactive nature of the platform, making it easy to communicate and leave feedback for me. I highly recommend Copper Health!
Jarel B. 
Clinic Director & Partner
”
I like the ease of access for patients. Texting-based engagement is so much better than downloading a mobile app. It has already had a huge impact on the success of a number of my patients. My patients have loved getting reminders about their exercises and have had a positive view of Copper Health so far!
Jack B. 
Patient
”
It’s super easy to access my home exercise program without having to download an app. The whole experience has been very seamless, without any barriers. Being able to stay in touch remotely with my physical therapist and care coordinator puts me on the right path and definitely makes me feel more optimistic about my recovery.
Hena L. 
Patient
”
I like how easy it is to check my home exercises and stay in touch with my physical therapist between sessions. The reminders from Copper Health are great for keeping me on track. I’ve been doing my home exercises a lot more and seeing some good improvements so far.
Angela H. 
Patient
”
Overall, it’s been really helpful. I love that I can message my physical therapist anytime. It’s reassuring to know I can ask questions or share feedback without having to wait until my next visit. My physical therapist and care coordinator also check in on me sometimes, which I appreciate.
[](https://www.copperhealth.co/</>)

generated_description:
### Copper Health: A New Dawn in Patient Engagement

Founded in 2024, Copper Health is a fresh player in the health-tech arena, emerging from the esteemed Y Combinator Batch W24. With its headquarters in San Francisco and a lean team of just two, Copper is on a mission to forge a modern patient engagement and remote therapeutic monitoring (RTM) platform that’s reshaping physical therapy practices.

Initially developed as a comprehensive RTM solution for physical therapy, Copper Health leverages artificial intelligence to enhance patient compliance and satisfaction. Their platform is a win-win for clinicians and patients alike, promoting ongoing engagement and efficient communication while easing the administrative burdens typically associated with RTM.

**The Offerings:**
1. **AI-Powered Remote Therapeutic Monitoring**: Tailored specifically for physical therapists, Copper Health enables providers to earn meaningful reimbursements (up to $165 per patient monthly) while offering streamlined integration with various Electronic Medical Record (EMR) systems.
   
2. **Seamless Setup**: Their solution is designed to be low-stress; therapists can enroll patients in mere seconds without tedious manual entry—the data management happens automatically, so clinicians can focus on patient care.

3. **Text-Based Engagement**: Forget cumbersome app downloads—patients can interact with the platform through simple text messages, keeping them engaged and informed about their home exercise programs.

**What Makes Copper Stand Out?**
The sheer convenience it provides is significant. Copper Health’s platform not only promises to simplify the RTM process but also actively enhances patient outcomes by facilitating continuous communication. As therapists track progress remotely, patients develop stronger relationships with their clinicians and feel more connected, which ultimately leads to better recovery rates.

**Feedback from Users**:
Testimonials from clinicians and patients dispel any doubt about Copper’s effectiveness. With rave reviews focusing on ease of use, seamless communication, and enhanced patient engagement, it’s clear that the platform is already making waves in therapy practices.

In a nutshell, Copper Health is not just another tech solution; it's a holistic approach to patient engagement that couples advanced technology with genuine care. With its strong foundations in AI and patient-centered design, it’s poised to transform how physical therapy is delivered—and how patients experience their recovery journey.

For more detailed insights, you can visit their website at [Copper Health](https://www.copperhealth.co/).
